attributes.action: ensure all firms have to pay insurance to cover redundancy and compensation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Firms that vanish or go into liquidation can leave genuine claimants with no proper recompense. Employment Tribunal decisions can be virtually unenforceable if the owners or the firms cannot be found. A percentage of the tax on all employers should be placed into a central compensation fund to cover any tribunal awards.
